price: 12. Markay (Naartu) ka aragto meel fog, waxay ka maqlaan cadho daran iyo cartan.
arabic: إِذَا رَأَتۡهُم مِّن مَّكَانِۭ بَعِيدٖ سَمِعُواْ لَهَا تَغَيُّظٗا وَزَفِيرٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: idhā ra-athum min makānin baʿīdin samiʿū lahā taghayyuẓan wazafīran
